pasta.name: Tuscani Chicken Alfredo Pasta
pasta.ingredients: Grilled chicken breast strips and rotini pasta baked in alfredo sauce with a layer of cheese. Served with an order of breadsticks. Serves 2.

pasta.name: Tuscani Meaty Marinara Pasta
pasta.ingredients: Italian-seasoned meat sauce and rotini pasta topped with cheese. Served with an order of breadsticks. Serves 2

wings.name: Large Traditional Wings
wings.ingredients: Our classic juicy, meaty bone-in wings served perfectly crispy and tossed in sauce. Bigger. Better. Bolder

wings.name: Breaded Bone-Out Wings
wings.ingredients: 100% all-white meat chicken covered in savory breading, tossed in your choice of sauce.

wings.name: Individual Wing Meal
wings.ingredients: 6 - 8 WingStreet® Wings with your choice of sauce and an order of fries.

wings.name: Family Wing Meal
wings.ingredients: 12 - 16 WingStreet® Wings with your choice of two sauces and two orders of fries.

wings.name: Party Wing Meal
wings.ingredients: 18 - 24 WingStreet® Wings with your choice of three sauces and two orders of fries.
